name: Neon Seeker
description:
In the neon city, your wife and daughter have been kidnapped by the mob. Sneak into their base, hide from mobsters, and avoid their spotlights to save your family before it's too late.

Team:

Nytheris - Programmer

LinkBA - Artist, Writer

Enpitsu_hito - Artist
